question: What are the important dates?
answer: Important dates include: January 26 (Republic Day), January 15 (Pongal Festival), February 14 (Valentine's Day), March 8 (International Women's Day), March 15 (Technical Symposium), April 14 (Ambedkar Jayanti), May 1 (Labor Day), June 5 (World Environment Day), July 15 (Hackathon), August 15 (Independence Day), September 5 (Teacher's Day), October 2 (Gandhi Jayanti), October 5 (World Teacher's Day), November 14 (Children's Day), December 25 (Christmas), December 31 (New Year's Eve).

question: What clubs are available?
answer: Available clubs include: GDG (Google Developer Group), Creatix (Photography Club), NSS (National Service Scheme), IEEE (Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers). Ask about a specific club for more details!

question: What is GDG club?
answer: GDG (Google Developer Group) is a community of developers interested in Google's developer technology. Lead: Nandita. Website: https://gdg.community.dev/, Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/gdg_vijayawada/, LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/gdg-vijayawada/

question: What is Creatix club?
answer: Creatix is a Photography Club managed by CSE department. Lead: CSE Department. Website: https://creatixclub.com/, Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/creatix_club/, LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/creatix-club/

question: What is NSS?
answer: NSS (National Service Scheme) is a social service organization for students. Coordinator: K. Narendra sir. Website: https://nss.gov.in/, Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nss_vrsiddhartha/, LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/nss-vrsiddhartha/

question: What is IEEE?
answer: IEEE (Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers) is a professional association for electrical and electronics engineering. Lead: IEEE Student Branch. Website: https://www.ieee.org/, Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ieee_vrsiddhartha/, LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/ieee-vrsiddhartha/

question: What is the college website?
answer: College Official Website: https://www.siddhartha.ac.in/. Other links: Admissions: https://www.siddhartha.ac.in/admissions/, Academics: https://www.siddhartha.ac.in/academics/, Research: https://www.siddhartha.ac.in/research/, Contact: https://www.siddhartha.ac.in/contact/

question: What are the college social media links?
answer: College Social Media Links: Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/siddhartha_academy/, LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/siddhartha-academy-of-higher-education/, Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SiddharthaAcademy/, Twitter: https://twitter.com/SiddharthaAcademy

question: How can I contact the college?
answer: You can contact the college through: Contact Page: https://www.siddhartha.ac.in/contact/, Email: info@siddhartha.ac.in, Phone: +91-866-2493777, Address: Velagapudi, Guntur District, Andhra Pradesh, India.

answer: For admission information, please visit: https://www.siddhartha.ac.in/admissions/ or contact the admissions office directly.
